titleStmt.title: An account of the province of Carolina in America together with an abstract of the patent, and several other necessary and useful particulars, to such as have thoughts of transporting themselves thither : published for their information.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Samuel, fl. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Larkin for Francis Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
